column4: Tesla's sales head to get $700 000 payout on meeting targets
column5: Electric carmaker Tesla Inc said on Wednesday it would pay $700 000 to its global sales and service president  Jon McNeill  if he met certain targets for 2017.

column4: Tesla's sales head to get $700 000 payout on meeting targets
column5: Aug 23 Electric carmaker Tesla Inc said on Wednesday it would pay $700 000 to its global sales and service president  Jon McNeill  if he met certain targets for 2017.
